title: Leaden Gaming LF TOP laner + Coach and more..
body:
Leaden Gaming is a newly formed league of legends team and we are looking for many positions.

Positions available:
- ~~Jg (P1 +)~~
- Coach(s)
- Manager
- Top Laner

The coach will be required to help players individually as well as the team as a whole. The coach will be required to think of team compositions that we can use during scrims.

The manager will be required to find the team(s) scrims and potentially new talent.

Amateur/first-time coaches are welcome as long as there is a competitive drive. 

If you are interested in any of these 3 positions please Add me on League: Split Pushen
Or on Discord: AlethalPancake #1598

replies.body: Would be helpful to state what rank your team is looking for  i.e. plat+/diamond+ or silver etc
